summary.para: [The feature associated with this page, DirectShow, is a legacy feature. It has been superseded by MediaPlayer, , and Audio/Video Capture in Media Foundation. Those features have been optimized for Windows 10 and Windows 11. Microsoft strongly recommends that new code use MediaPlayer, IMFMediaEngine and Audio/Video Capture in Media Foundation instead of DirectShow, when possible. Microsoft suggests that existing code that uses the legacy APIs be rewritten to use the new APIs if possible.]
Defines the possible language extensions in a specified subpicture stream.

member.name: DVD_SUBPICTURE_LANG_EXT.DVD_SP_EXT_NotSpecified
member.summary: Indicates that no language extensions are present.

member.name: DVD_SUBPICTURE_LANG_EXT.DVD_SP_EXT_Caption_Normal
member.summary: Indicates that the specified stream contains normal captions.

member.name: DVD_SUBPICTURE_LANG_EXT.DVD_SP_EXT_Caption_Big
member.summary: Indicates that the specified stream contains big captions.

member.name: DVD_SUBPICTURE_LANG_EXT.DVD_SP_EXT_Caption_Children
member.summary: Indicates that the specified stream contains captions for children.

member.name: DVD_SUBPICTURE_LANG_EXT.DVD_SP_EXT_CC_Normal
member.summary: Indicates that the specified stream contains normal closed captions.

member.name: DVD_SUBPICTURE_LANG_EXT.DVD_SP_EXT_CC_Big
member.summary: Indicates that the specified stream contains big closed captions.

member.name: DVD_SUBPICTURE_LANG_EXT.DVD_SP_EXT_CC_Children
member.summary: Indicates that the specified stream contains closed captions for children.

member.name: DVD_SUBPICTURE_LANG_EXT.DVD_SP_EXT_Forced
member.summary: Indicates that the subpicture stream is forcedly activated, meaning that the application will not be able to turn it off.

member.name: DVD_SUBPICTURE_LANG_EXT.DVD_SP_EXT_DirectorComments_Normal
member.summary: Indicates that the specified stream contains normal-sized director's comments.

member.name: DVD_SUBPICTURE_LANG_EXT.DVD_SP_EXT_DirectorComments_Big
member.summary: Indicates that the specified stream contains large-sized director's comments.

member.name: DVD_SUBPICTURE_LANG_EXT.DVD_SP_EXT_DirectorComments_Children
member.summary: Indicates that the specified stream contains director's comments for children.
